messageValues.message:
=You are a professional email writing assistant specialized in crafting highly personalized B2B outreach emails.  When I invoke you, I will provide a JSON object containing:

• lead data:
  – companyName  
  – jobTitle  
  – jobDescription  
  – companyDescription  
  – lead email fields: { email, type, first_name, last_name, position, department, phone_number }  
• our agency’s data:
  – business_name  
  – service_description  
  – your_name  
  – mobile_number  
  – website_link  
  – your_position  

Your task is to generate a single, plain‑text email (no JSON) with the following strict requirements:

1. **Subject Line**  
   - Must be concise (6–8 words) and reference the lead’s company or role.  
   - E.g.: “Scale VidUnit’s Brand Partnerships Faster”  

2. **Greeting**  
   - Address the lead by first name: “Hi Sania,” if email type is personal or "Hi, Team" if type is generic. 

3. **Introductory Paragraph**  
   - 1–2 sentences that show you’ve read their LinkedIn job post: mention their role (Brand Partnership Manager) and one key fact from the jobDescription or companyDescription.  
   - E.g.: “I saw you’re leading Brand Partnerships at VidUnit—your team’s work with PunToon Kids and your data‑driven influencer platform is impressive.”  

4. **Pain‑Point + Solution Paragraph**  
   - 2–3 sentences that connect one or two challenges implicit in their job (e.g. securing brand sponsorships at scale, managing multiple creator campaigns) to your service_description.  
   - Use concrete language: “Rather than hiring a single rep, our dedicated team handles lead gen, follow‑ups, market research, and campaign strategy—all in parallel, so you hit your sponsorship targets faster and with no training overhead.”  

5. **Value Proposition Paragraph**  
   - 2–3 bullet points or short sentences summarizing your top benefits:  
     • “Faster results with a full support squad, not just one hire.”  
     • “End‑to‑end campaign management from pitch to reporting.”  
     • “Scale without the HR hassle—pay only for outcomes.”  

6. **Call to Action**  
   - 1 sentence proposing next step: “Could we schedule a 15‑minute call this week to explore how our team can accelerate VidUnit’s brand partnerships?”  

7. **Closing & Signature**  
   - “Best regards,”  
   - Then your_name, your_position, business_name  
   - If website_link or mobile_number is provided, include them on separate lines.  

8. **Footer**  
   - If the input JSON includes any additional “phone_number” for the lead or other contact details, **do not** include them—only include your own footer info.  
   - Do not add any generic marketing slogans or disclaimers beyond what’s specified.  

**Important:**  
- **Use only** the data fields provided in the JSON; do not invent titles, numbers, or links.  
- **Do not** reference the LLM, n8n, or any tool—write as a human sender.  
- Keep the tone professional, friendly, and focused on ROI and efficiency.  
- The output must be a single email text, ready to paste into Gmail.

parameters.jsCode:
return [
  {
      allData: {
        jobId: $('Loop Over Items2').first().json.id,
        website_description: $('HTTP Request').first().json.description,
        domain: $('HTTP Request').first().json.websiteUrl,
        companyName: $('Loop Over Items2').first().json.companyName,
        emailId: $('Code2').first().json.value,
        type: $('Code2').first().json.type,
        first_name: $('Code2').first().json.first_name,
        last_name: $('Code2').first().json.last_name,
        position: $('Code2').first().json.position,
        department: $('Code2').first().json.department,
        phone_no: $('Code2').first().json.phone_number,
        jobDescription: $('Loop Over Items2').first().json.description,
        location: $('Loop Over Items2').first().json.location,
        title: $('Loop Over Items2').first().json.title,
        jobType: $('Loop Over Items2').first().json.workType,
        subject: $input.first().json.output.subject,
        content: $input.first().json.output.content,
        companyId: $('Loop Over Items2').first().json.companyId,
        jobURL: $('Loop Over Items2').first().json.jobUrl,
        employee_count: $('HTTP Request').first().json.employeeCount,
        user_email: $('Limit1').first().json["Email address"],
        agency_name: $('Limit1').first().json["Your Agency's name"],
        timeStamp: $('Limit1').first().json.Timestamp
      }
  }
];

messageValues.message: In the input below you will get a list in json format which contains details about a b2b lead. It contains details like "email", "name", "position", "department", etc. You can get a multiple people in that list ranging from 1 to 10, but need to only pass best 2 persons forward if the input has more than 2 people. Let me define what i mean by the best: These are all b2b leads whose company has posted about a job on their Linkedin, and thus me as an agency is targeting and pitching them my services so that they dont need to hire, instead use my services. So for that you need to filter the best emails for me like HR department, Managers, Recruiters, etc out of all the emails and only pass exact 2 emails if input has more than 2, otherwise if less than 2 then pass them as it is. And keep in mind to return only the email id which is inside the key "value" and nothing else as filtered output.

parameters.jsCode:
const input = $input.first().json.output.allContacts;

return input.map(item => ({ json: item }));

json.title: Editor
json.description:
About The Company

Morningstar DBRS offers independent credit opinions and thought leadership on corporate and sovereign entities, financial institutions, and project and structured finance transactions globally. Rating over 4,000 issuers and 60,000 securities, we are one of the four largest credit rating agencies in the world.

Morningstar DBRS is one of the largest and fastest-growing businesses within Morningstar, and the Global Editorial, Publishing, and Media Relations team is critical to achieving this success.

About The Position

As a member of the Editorial, Publishing, and Media Relations team in Mumbai, the Copy Editor will be responsible for editing and producing financial services research reports and other documents on a timely basis. This position reports to the Manager of Credit Operations in Mumbai.

Responsibilities


 * Provide accurate, high-quality editing and proofreading of documents, including press releases, credit rating reports, industry research, and analytical methodologies, in a timely manner.
 * Maintain relationships with analysts, designers, management, and other stakeholders to produce and enhance content.
 * Ensure all deliverables comply with internal guidelines for style, conventions, and brand management.
 * Fulfill document requests and manage deadlines for several analysts and projects at once.
 * Participate in global team meetings as required.
   
   

Requirements


 * Minimum five years of experience as an editor, preferably in the financial services industry or in business journalism.
 * Strong copy editing, organizational skills, and attention to detail.
 * Capacity to work independently, as well as part of a team.
 * Demonstrated ability to meet deadlines and work with minimal supervision.
 * Advanced expertise in Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook is required.
 * Knowledge of Adobe InDesign and Illustrator is an asset.
 * University degree in a related field.
 * Preference is given to candidates with a basic understanding of the debt market, securitization, and the credit rating process.
   
   

Morningstar DBRS is an equal opportunity employer.

About Us

Morningstar DBRS is a leading provider of independent rating services and opinions for corporate and sovereign entities, financial institutions, and project and structured finance instruments globally. Rating more than 4,000 issuers and 60,000 securities, it is one of the top four credit rating agencies in the world.

Morningstar DBRS empowers investor success by bringing more transparency and a much-needed diversity of opinion in the credit rating industry. Our approach and size allow us to be nimble enough to respond to customers' needs in their local markets, but large enough to provide the necessary expertise and resources they require. Market innovators choose to work with us because of our agility, tech-forward approach, and exceptional customer service.

Morningstar DBRS is the next generation of credit ratings.

If you receive and accept an offer from us, we require that personal and any related investments be disclosed confidentiality to our Compliance team (days vary by region). These investments will be reviewed to ensure they meet Code of Ethics requirements. If any conflicts of interest are identified, then you will be required to liquidate those holdings immediately. In addition, dependent on your department and location of work certain employee accounts must be held with an approved broker (for example all, U.S. employee accounts). If this applies and your account(s) are not with an approved broker, you will be required to move your holdings to an approved broker.

Morningstar’s hybrid work environment gives you the opportunity to work remotely and collaborate in-person each week. While some positions are available as fully remote, we’ve found that we’re at our best when we’re purposely together on a regular basis, typically three days each week. A range of other benefits are also available to enhance flexibility as needs change. No matter where you are, you’ll have tools and resources to engage meaningfully with your global colleagues.

R11_DBRSRatingsGmbHIndia DBRS Ratings GmbH, Branch India Legal Entity

json.title: Mid-Motion Graphic Designer
json.description:
Established in 2004, OLIVER is the world’s first and only specialist in designing, building, and running bespoke in-house agencies and marketing ecosystems for brands. We partner with over 300 clients in 40+ countries and counting. Our unique model drives creativity and efficiency, allowing us to deliver tailored solutions that resonate deeply with audiences.

As a part of The Brandtech Group, we're at the forefront of leveraging cutting-edge AI technology to revolutionise how we create and deliver work. Our AI solutions enhance efficiency, spark creativity, and drive insightful decision-making, empowering our teams to produce innovative and impactful results.

Role: Mid-Motion Graphic Designer

Location: Mumbai, India

About the role:

The Motion Graphic Designer is responsible for designing and creating digital content, interactive programs and videos for Beauty/Lifestyle brands. With a thorough understanding of user centred design and how different digital channels present different challenges and opportunities the Multimedia Designer is skilled at combining text, audio, animation, photography, and video to create engaging and impactful content. Passion for and inquisitive about AI and new technologies. Understanding and knowledge of AI tools is beneficial, but ability to learn and digest benefits and features of AI tools is critical.

The Motion Graphic Designer focus on moving motion animation for each of the digital asset to enhance the storytelling based on the creative idea of the Lead Creator/Digital Designer.

What you will be doing:


 * Responsible for the successful delivery of multimedia content across a range of platforms
 * Thorough understanding user centred design and how different digital channels present different challenges and opportunities for each asset
 * Ability to conceptualise and develop the animation for the moving motion asset
 * Ability to input at early project stages, effectively communicating technical, creative, and production issues and solutions both internally and to the client
 * Strong design skills
 * Thorough understanding of the Adobe Master Collection including After Effects
 * Strong typographic skills
 * Identify areas to develop multimedia content
   
   

What you need to be great in this role:


 * Someone who is immersed in digital culture and involved in the ideation process as well as being able to utilise the Adobe Creative Suite software with a thorough understanding of storyboarding, video capture, editing and distribution of digital video.
 * Typically 3 years proven track record in a digital media design background
 * Experience with beauty or skincare product digital advertising is a bonus
 * Confidence and comfortable working in a fast-paced, changing client environment
 * A creative, innovative can-do approach.
 * A professional attitude and flexible working approach.
 * The aptitude to learn new software and programmes efficiently and effectively
 * Self-motivated, working with little supervision
 * Collaborative team player, open minded – non political
 * Discrete about all confidential and personal information
 * Driven, proactive, helpful, and enthusiastic team player
   
   

Req ID: 12585

Our values shape everything we do:

Be Ambitious to succeed 

Be Imaginative to push the boundaries of what’s possible 

Be Inspirational to do groundbreaking work 

Be always learning and listening to understand 

Be Results-focused  to exceed expectations 

Be actively pro-inclusive and anti-racist across our community, clients and creations 

OLIVER, a part of the Brandtech Group, is an equal opportunity employer committed to creating an inclusive working environment where all employees are encouraged to reach their full potential, and individual differences are valued and respected. All applicants shall be considered for employment without regard to race, ethnicity, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, neurodivergence, disability status, or any other characteristic protected by local laws. 

 OLIVER has set ambitious environmental goals around sustainability, with science-based emissions reduction targets. Collectively, we work towards our mission, embedding sustainability into every department and through every stage of the project lifecycle.

json.title: Operations Internship in Mumbai, Delhi, Dubai
json.description:
Selected Intern's Day-to-day Responsibilities Include


 * Backend e-commerce operations work
 * Audting of orders
 * Social media analytics auditing
   
   

About Company: Creatorshala was started in 2020, basically, it was started for music distribution, and now it's both for video content and music distribution. Moreover, it serves more than 50 countries for the same all across India and the world. If you are a blogger, influencer, YouTuber, musician, singer, producer, or any type of creator, we are the most suitable platform for you, also it has its content sharing cum influencer marketing platform named Creatorshala. As from Creatorshala, we make content for bloggers and influencers in fashion, beauty, lifestyle, food, travel, lifestyle, and luxury categories. We help creators to work with the right brands with which they want to work.

json.title: Brand Partnership Manager
json.description:
Designation: Manager

Department: Brand Partnerships

Company: VidUnit Media Pvt Ltd

Reports to: CEO

Location: Mumbai




About Us:

VidUnit: It’s a data driven influencer, publisher and brand management platform founded by Ex Director of Alibaba. Please visit https://vidunit.com/ for more details.

PunToon Kids: Its of one of the biggest Indianized Kids community on YouTube in India. Available in 9 languages and reach 100 M audience every month. https://www.youtube.com/@PunToonKids




Job overview:

We are looking for a dynamic and results-driven professional to acquire new brands for VidUnit’s influencer and content marketing services and secure brand sponsorships for the PunToon Kids YouTube channel network. The role involves lead generation, client meetings, negotiations, and achieving sales targets while developing and managing influencer-driven campaigns.




Key Responsibilities:

*Drive revenue for PunToon Kids by securing partnerships for original content with brands and agencies.

*Acquiring new brands for influencer/ content marketing services of VidUnit and new Lead generation, client meeting, negotiations and achieving the desired targets.

*Working closely with clients, ad agencies, creative agencies to offer best creators driven marketing solutions, content strategy and production services.

*Development of new and existing leads for influencer/creator driven campaigns.

*Building relationships with advertising and creative agencies.




Desired Skills and Experience:

*Detailed understanding of influencer market.

*Good working relations with digital media agencies.

*Minimum 4-6 years of experience in Digital Media Sales and minimum 1 years in influencer domain/content marketing sales.

*Strong relationships with brand managers, brand owners, and agencies.




Please fill out the form below to

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfwf8MkEAilZXRQP01MWpzgSWt89M6gmOblnmL_fDvolZzXkg/viewform?usp=header

json.title: Marketing & Communications Manager
json.description:
About You


 * You are not just a marketer—you are a growth hacker, trend-spotter, and out-of-the-box thinker rolled into one. You eat conventional marketing playbooks for breakfast and replace them with bold, disruptive strategies . You don’t just follow trends—you set them .
 * You have spent the last few years reinventing B2B marketing —maybe with guerrilla campaigns, meme-worthy LinkedIn posts, or data-driven experiments that made competitors go “Wait, why didn’t we think of that?”
 * Last but not the least, you should be someone who is chronically online (but in a productive way) and allergic to boring content.
   
   

What You Will Do


 * Reimagine & Reinvent: Torq’s marketing isn’t broken—but why settle for "good" when we can be unforgettable? You will challenge the status quo and inject fresh, bold ideas into everything we do.
 * Trend Hunter: You will stalk the market (in a non-creepy way) to spot what’s next—be it AI-powered engagement, viral B2B storytelling, or even Instagram for commodities (hey, why not?).
 * Unconventional Storyteller: You won’t just write blogs—you will craft content that slaps. Think snappy LinkedIn hooks, edgy thought leadership, and campaigns that make our audience go “Damn, Torq gets it.”
 * Competitor FOMO Creator: You will make sure Torq isn’t just keeping up—we are leading the charge. If our competitors copy us? Good. Mission accomplished.
   
   

This isn't your typical "post on LinkedIn 3x a week" role. You will be:


 * Bringing fresh, borderline chaotic energy to our strategy

 * Researching industry trends before they're trending
 * Creating marketing that doesn't feel like marketing
 * Making strategic moves that have our competitors taking screenshots
   
   

Who You Are

✔ A Strategic Rebel – You don’t just execute; you redefine the game .

✔ Data-Lover + Creative Genius – You back wild ideas with cold, hard analytics .

✔ Obsessed with Growth – You live for “What’s next?” and “How can we do this better?”

✔ Tech-Savvy – Because if you are not leveraging AI, automation, and weirdly effective hacks, are you even marketing?

The green flags we are looking for


 * You have got receipts (case studies) from previous B2B work that actually slapped

 * You can explain complex ideas without putting people to sleep
 * You are obsessed with what makes things go viral, even in "boring" industries
 * You send "you have to see this" messages to your group chats about clever marketing campaigns
 * You know the difference between genuinely innovative and just weird for weird’ s sake
   
   

Don’t Apply If


 * You need someone to hand you a to-do list every morning.
 * You are only here for the salary.
 * You believe “this is how we’ve always done it” is a valid reason.
   
   

Requirements


 * Experience: 2-3 years of breaking norms in B2B marketing, where you didn’t just run email campaigns or post LinkedIn carousels on repeat. (No boring brochures, please!).
 * Education: Tier 1 college postgrad + BTech/BE (Because logic + creativity = Fire). You are a proud graduate from a Tier-1 college (IIM, ISB, MICA, etc.) and survived the engineering gauntlet before that
 * Mindset : You think brand storytelling is just as important as spreadsheets. You hate mediocrity and wake up every day thinking about how to outsmart the competition
   
   

Why Torq?

No Red Tape, Just Green Lights – Pitch crazy ideas? We will say, “Try it.”

Ownership & Impact – This isn’t a support role—you will shape our voice and strategy.

Work with a High-Energy Team – We are ambitious, fast, and a little quirky (okay, a lot).

Ready to Break the Mold?

If you are nodding along like “This was made for me” , shoot us your resume + one marketing idea that would make Torq stand out (bonus points if it’s weirdly genius). Let’s make marketing that doesn’t just talk—it slaps .

  • You are obsessed with what makes things go viral, even in "boring" industries
  • You send "you have to see this" messages to your group chats about clever marketing campaigns
  • You know the difference between genuinely innovative and just weird for weird’ s sake

Don’t Apply If

  • You need someone to hand you a to-do list every morning.
  • You are only here for the salary.
  • You believe “this is how we’ve always done it” is a valid reason.

Requirements

  • Experience: 2-3 years of breaking norms in B2B marketing, where you didn’t just run email campaigns or post LinkedIn carousels on repeat. (No boring brochures, please!).
  • Education: Tier 1 college postgrad + BTech/BE (Because logic + creativity = Fire). You are a proud graduate from a Tier-1 college (IIM, ISB, MICA, etc.) and survived the engineering gauntlet before that
  • Mindset : You think brand storytelling is just as important as spreadsheets. You hate mediocrity and wake up every day thinking about how to outsmart the competition

Why Torq?

No Red Tape, Just Green Lights – Pitch crazy ideas? We will say, “Try it.”

Ownership & Impact – This isn’t a support role—you will shape our voice and strategy.

Work with a High-Energy Team – We are ambitious, fast, and a little quirky (okay, a lot).

Ready to Break the Mold?

If you are nodding along like “This was made for me” , shoot us your resume + one marketing idea that would make Torq stand out (bonus points if it’s weirdly genius). Let’s make marketing that doesn’t just talk—it slaps .

json.title: Analyst
json.description:
Job Description

We are looking for skilled web content creator who has experience of working on web content management tools such as Amazon Vendor Central. The candidate will be responsible for developing and designing front-end web pages using 3rd party vendor tools and working alongside graphic designers for web design among other duties. Knowledge of Amazon Vendor Central Tool will be an advantage. The candidate will be required to see out a project from conception to final product, requiring good organizational skills, and attention to detail.

The ideal candidate must possess strong verbal and written communication skills, with an ability to listen and comprehend information and share it with all the key stakeholders. She/he must be able to work collaboratively with teams to execute tasks within defined timeframes while maintaining high-quality standards and superior service levels.

Analyst Role And Responsibilities


 * Develop content on web pages as per defined guidelines and client requirements
 * Work with graphic designers for creating assets like images, banners, videos, documents etc for designing web pages
 * Provide QA support for peers to maintain high quality of content on web pages
 * Support request management as per priorities coming from client
 * Coordinate with multiple stakeholders/teams to understand project requirements
 * Coordinate with team members and managing multiple requests/projects simultaneously
 * Maintain all data and reports related to requests/projects
   
   

Qualification


 * BCA, BBA, B.Com with any IT certification/course related to Website Management, Content Management, B.Sc (Physics/Chemistry/Maths/IT/Computer Science)
 * Any Graduate with 6 months to 1 year of experience Web Content Management (Front-End).
   
   

Technical And Functional Skills


 * Maintain and update content of website using 3rd party tools
 * Working experience of Amazon Vendor Central tool or similar tool will be an advantage
 * Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
 * Ability to quickly and efficiently assimilate process knowledge
 * Professional in conduct/behaviour, appearance and communication
 * Must be reliable in terms of attendance and timing
 * Flexible for US/Europe Shifts
 * Basic Knowledge of excel for reporting
 * Good documentation skills
   
   

About Us

At eClerx, we serve some of the largest global companies – 50 of the Fortune 500 clients. Our clients call upon us to solve their most complex problems, and deliver transformative insights. Across roles and levels, you get the opportunity to build expertise, challenge the status quo, think bolder, and help our clients seize value

About The Team

eClerx is a global leader in productized services, bringing together people, technology and domain expertise to amplify business results. Our mission is to set the benchmark for client service and success in our industry. Our vision is to be the innovation partner of choice for technology, data analytics and process management services. Since our inception in 2000, we've partnered with top companies across various industries, including financial services, telecommunications, retail, and high-tech. Our innovative solutions and domain expertise help businesses optimize operations, improve efficiency, and drive growth. With over 18,000 employees worldwide, eClerx is dedicated to delivering excellence through smart automation and data-driven insights. At eClerx, we believe in nurturing talent and providing hands-on experience.

eClerx is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability or protected veteran status, or any other legally protected basis, per applicable law.

json.title: Influencer
json.description:
Job Description: We are looking for a creative and outgoing individual who is passionate about social media content creation. As a Reel Creator and Social Media Influencer, you will be responsible for producing engaging and visually appealing content for our various social media platforms, with a primary focus on Instagram Reels.

Responsibilities:

 * Create high-quality, engaging Instagram Reels that align with our brand identity and marketing objectives.
 * Plan, and execute creative ideas for Reels content, including but not limited to product showcases, tutorials, lifestyle content, and behind-the-scenes glimpses.
 * Act as the face of our brand by featuring in Reels, showcasing products/services, and effectively communicating key messages to our audience.
 * Collaborate with other influencers, UGC and brands as and when needed
 * Collaborate with our marketing team to develop content strategies and campaigns that drive engagement and growth.
 * Stay up-to-date with social media trends, algorithm changes, and emerging platforms to ensure our content remains relevant and effective.
 * Monitor and analyze performance metrics to optimize content and maximize reach and engagement.
 * Participate in photoshoots and video productions as needed, demonstrating comfort and confidence in front of the camera.
 * Create and Execute Social Media plans as prepared by the marketing team
 * Collaborate with other influencers and brands to increase visibility

Requirements:

 * Proven experience creating compelling content for social media platforms, particularly Instagram Reels.
 * Strong understanding of social media trends, best practices, and platform algorithms.
 * Excellent communication and storytelling skills, with the ability to convey messages effectively through visuals and captions.
 * Comfortable and confident in front of the camera, with experience in photo and video shoots.
 * Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment, managing multiple projects simultaneously.
 * Creative thinker with a keen eye for detail and a passion for creating visually stunning content.
 * Strong organizational and time management skills, with the ability to meet deadlines and prioritize tasks effectively.
 * Experience with graphic design and video editing software (e.g., Adobe Creative Suite, Final Cut Pro) is a plus.
 * A genuine interest in our industry/niche and a willingness to immerse yourself in our brand identity and values.

json.title: Junior Social Media Marketing Executive in Mumbai
json.description:
Job brief: This role offers the candidate a total immersion into a digital marketing business and the successful candidate will work closely with the founders and executives to learn about social media, digital communications, and marketing in a business-to-business environment. This role will be instrumental in increasing our social media presence and gaining visibility for our brand among clients.

Key Responsibilities


 * Build and maintain a daily, weekly, and monthly social media calendar
 * Create an engaging content strategy for social media platforms i.e. posts, stories, etc.
 * Leverage trending topics.
 * Working on content engagements, likes, views & more
 * Work as an experienced content creator, shooter, and editor to execute content in real-time across social media and emerging platform
 * Interact, engage, and communicate with influencers across all platforms
 * Planning, creating, and managing social media handles for the clients.
 * Work on SEO (keyword research, content briefs, off-page SEO)
 * Preparing monthly content calendars.
 * Preparing social media reports and summary
 * Planning contests & promotions for social media.
 * Running social media ads from the ads manager.
   
   

Other Requirements


 * Fluency in verbal and written English
 * Basic knowledge of Word, Excel, etc.
 * Hands-on knowledge of social media platforms.
 * Excellent understanding of digital marketing concepts
 * Strong creative and analytical skills
 * Good communication skills
 * Minimum experience of 4 to 6 Months
   
   

About Company: Rannka Digital 'the revolution in the digital world.' We are one of the best digital marketing agencies in Mumbai that focuses on ROI-driven digital marketing. We have clients across all verticals with a strong presence in digital marketing.

json.title: Intern - Social Media
json.description:
Overview

Social Donut is a dynamic and innovative digital marketing agency based in Mumbai, dedicated to delivering creative and impactful marketing solutions for our diverse clientele.

We are seeking a talented and passionate Social Media Intern to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing high-quality, engaging content that resonates with our target audience and supports our clients' digital marketing goals. This role requires a creative mindset, strong writing skills, and a deep understanding of digital marketing trends.

Responsibilities


 * Create and feature in compelling and original content ( Reels, Videos, Voiceovers) for various digital platforms (Instagram, FB, YouTube, LinkedIn)
 * Research industry-related topics to generate ideas and produce content that attracts and engages our target audience.
 * Stay up-to-date with the latest digital marketing trends, tools, and best practices.
 * Assist in the planning and execution of content marketing campaigns and initiatives.
   
   

Requirements


 * Bachelor's degree in any related field.
 * Proven experience as a Content Creator, or a similar role.
 * Confident in front of Camera . Previous experience in acting / theatre can be a plus.
 * Strong organizational and time-management skills.
 * Knowledge of multimedia content creation tools (e.g., Adobe Creative Suite, Canva) is a plus.

  • Strong organizational and time-management skills.
  • Knowledge of multimedia content creation tools (e.g., Adobe Creative Suite, Canva) is a plus.

json.title: Marketing & Communications Manager
json.description:
Job Description

About You:


 * You are not just a marketer—you are a growth hacker, trend-spotter, and out-of-the-box thinker rolled into one. You eat conventional marketing playbooks for breakfast and replace them with bold, disruptive strategies. You don’t just follow trends—you set them.
 * You have spent the last few years reinventing B2B marketing—maybe with guerrilla campaigns, meme-worthy LinkedIn posts, or data-driven experiments that made competitors go “Wait, why didn’t we think of that?”
 * Last but not the least, you should be someone who is chronically online (but in a productive way) and allergic to boring content.
   
   

What You Will Do:


 * Reimagine & Reinvent: Torq’s marketing isn’t broken—but why settle for "good" when we can be unforgettable? You will challenge the status quo and inject fresh, bold ideas into everything we do.
 * Trend Hunter: You will stalk the market (in a non-creepy way) to spot what’s next—be it AI-powered engagement, viral B2B storytelling, or even Instagram for commodities (hey, why not?).
 * Unconventional Storyteller: You won’t just write blogs—you will craft content that slaps. Think snappy LinkedIn hooks, edgy thought leadership, and campaigns that make our audience go “Damn, Torq gets it.”
 * Competitor FOMO Creator: You will make sure Torq isn’t just keeping up—we are leading the charge. If our competitors copy us? Good. Mission accomplished.
   
   

This isn't your typical "post on LinkedIn 3x a week" role. You will be:


 * Bringing fresh, borderline chaotic energy to our strategy
 * Researching industry trends before they're trending
 * Creating marketing that doesn't feel like marketing
 * Making strategic moves that have our competitors taking screenshots
   
   

Who You Are:

✔ A Strategic Rebel – You don’t just execute; you redefine the game.

✔ Data-Lover + Creative Genius – You back wild ideas with cold, hard analytics.

✔ Obsessed with Growth – You live for “What’s next?” and “How can we do this better?”

✔ Tech-Savvy – Because if you are not leveraging AI, automation, and weirdly effective hacks, are you even marketing?

The green flags we are looking for


 * You have got receipts (case studies) from previous B2B work that actually slapped
 * You can explain complex ideas without putting people to sleep
 * You are obsessed with what makes things go viral, even in "boring" industries
 * You send "you have to see this" messages to your group chats about clever marketing campaigns
 * You know the difference between genuinely innovative and just weird for weird’ s sake
   
   

Don’t Apply If:


 * You need someone to hand you a to-do list every morning.
 * You are only here for the salary.
 * You believe “this is how we’ve always done it” is a valid reason.
   
   

Requirements


 * Experience: 2-3 years of breaking norms in B2B marketing, where you didn’t just run email campaigns or post LinkedIn carousels on repeat. (No boring brochures, please!).
 * Education: Tier 1 college postgrad + BTech/BE (Because logic + creativity = Fire). You are a proud graduate from a Tier-1 college (IIM, ISB, MICA, etc.) and survived the engineering gauntlet before that
 * Mindset : You think brand storytelling is just as important as spreadsheets. You hate mediocrity and wake up every day thinking about how to outsmart the competition
   
   

Why Torq?

No Red Tape, Just Green Lights – Pitch crazy ideas? We will say, “Try it.”

Ownership & Impact – This isn’t a support role—you will shape our voice and strategy.

Work with a High-Energy Team – We are ambitious, fast, and a little quirky (okay, a lot).

Ready to Break the Mold?

If you are nodding along like “This was made for me”, shoot us your resume + one marketing idea that would make Torq stand out (bonus points if it’s weirdly genius). Let’s make marketing that doesn’t just talk—it slaps.

Requirements

Experience: 2-3 years of breaking norms in B2B marketing, where you didn’t just run email campaigns or post LinkedIn carousels on repeat. (No boring brochures, please!). Education: Tier 1 college postgrad + BTech/BE (Because logic + creativity = Fire). You are a proud graduate from a Tier-1 college (IIM, ISB, MICA, etc.) and survived the engineering gauntlet before that Mindset : You think brand storytelling is just as important as spreadsheets. You hate mediocrity and wake up every day thinking about how to outsmart the competition Why Torq? No Red Tape, Just Green Lights – Pitch crazy ideas? We will say, “Try it.” Ownership & Impact – This isn’t a support role—you will shape our voice and strategy. Work with a High-Energy Team – We are ambitious, fast, and a little quirky (okay, a lot). Ready to Break the Mold? If you are nodding along like “This was made for me”, shoot us your resume + one marketing idea that would make Torq stand out (bonus points if it’s weirdly genius). Let’s make marketing that doesn’t just talk—it slaps.
